description: This image shows an outdoor installation featuring a large display board with numerous portraits and biographical texts. The board appears to be a memorial or historical exhibit, detailing individuals involved in significant events, as indicated by the title 'Perpetrators' at the top. The installation is located in an urban setting, with trees and a city street visible in the background. The structure is made of metal and shows signs of weathering, suggesting it has been exposed to the elements for some time.
